Christine Duffy, president of Carnival Cruise Line, said in a video message to travel agents that the brand has no plans to move its ships from their U.S. homeports.

articles.title: Finnair Intends To Acquire 19-Seat Electric Aircraft - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: Finnair has signed a Letter of Interest to acquire 20 electric aircraft by 2026, each of which can seat 19 passengers.
